summary: I HAVE BEEN TRYING TO GET ANY DODGE DEALERSHIP TO HELP ME TAKE CARE OF RECALL RO3 AND I CONTINUE TO GET THE RUN AROUND.  I FINALLY GOT ONE TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT WITH AND TOOK THE DAY OFF OF WORK TO GET IT RESOLVED. AFTER WAITING FOR 3.5 HOURS I WAS TOLD THE "PART WASN'T IN" EVEN THOUGH I HAD SCHEDULED THE APPOINTMENT WEEKS IN ADVANCE AND WAS TOLD THEY HAD THE PARTS. SO AGAIN I HAVE GOTTEN THE RUN AROUND FROM DODGE.  I DO NOT HAVE CONFIDENCE THAT THIS PROBLEM WILL EVER BE TAKEN CARE OF BY DODGE.
